name: Avoid unreferenced Methods (PHP)
description: This rule searches for all unreferenced Methods.
output:
This report lists all unreferenced Methods.

This QR provides the following information:
Method full name.
rationale:
Unreferenced code may be a symptom of Dead Code. Dead Code must be avoided as it makes source code less readable and increases the cost of software maintenance.

Warning:
Unreferenced code can also be an indication of missing code (code referring to the method not included in the source code analysis) or can be a symptom of the use of polymorphism.
The intensive use of polymorphism can make the application easier to change but much more difficult to test, debug and stabilize.
remediation: Review the source code of the application to minimize the number of unreferenced Methods.

qualityStandards.name: Unreachable Named Callable or Method Control Element
